TopicTitle: KSP will cost 15.00 USD soon, so get it now!

Articles.Content:
As we already stated before in the About'>http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/about.php']About Page and in other posts, the price of the game will gradually increase up to it\'s final retail price as the game nears completion.

We are just finishing building the next update of KSP (0.14) and it will be released soon. Since it is the first paid version and it will come with many new features, KSP will cost 15.00 USD very soon. So if you haven\'t ordered KSP already, these are the final weeks to get the game for 10.00 USD! So order now!

Cheers.

Assuming that the price will increase when the patch is rolled out, we won\'t see the update until early next month. Not what I was hoping for (the ideal here being the patch has been out but I failed to notice), but at least it isn\'t VALVe time. And as the others have said, it would be ludicrous to make those who have already bought the game fork over more money. Now if this was EA on the other hand....

Or, they won\'t increase the price until it is out of experimental (makes sense) in which case if the full release is expected in a few weeks the experimental can be expected pretty soon!

Either way, I think it\'s about right. I paid $14 back when it was $7 because I thought it was worth double moneys. Considering a 3D movie these days costs $20 in NZ for 100min of fun, KSP is probably the best value money for fun ever.
